comments.html: New Flows are pushing more or less in real time. Everything is programmed using OpenFlow 1.3 directly from the controller(s). There is middleware that converts the flowmods to routes and vice verse. Code can be found here https://github.com/wandsdn/sc18-ansible and https://github.com/wandsdn/sc18-faucet-configs
